file_content.text: Well, don't just stand there patting yourself on the back. You wanna give the competition time to catch up?
Now's not the time to stand around jawin' with me, sugar. Huntmaster Assistant Lek's gonna want to hear about that auction.
Best hurry, or everything you've done up 'til now could be for nothin'.
Glad you responded so quickly. The Huntmaster's assistant's been waiting for ya.
